com.nfcalarmclock

Class NacNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nfcalarmclock.NacNotification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NacActiveAlarmNotification, NacMissedAlarmNotification, NacUpcomingAlarmNotification

    public abstract class NacNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Notification for the app to keep it in memory.
